name: Plex Web App 3.31.1 and more! Updated 10/26/2020
description:
An all in one style for your web apps.
If you use a complete download solution for movies, tv, & music... This theme works for all of the support apps used to download and manage .nzb & torrents. All themed for a integrated look and feel.

I use ProxMox for 2 Linux servers (VM's) to run all of these apps to support my movie, tv & music libraries.

**** cleaned up code to validate clean ****
additional_info: Full Integration theme for Movie / TV / Music download apps. Best when used with this ::: Companion Theme !!! Plex Web App 3.31.1 Transmission 2.92 (14714) Tautulli / PlexPy 1.x & 2.0 QuickBox Radarr Sonarr Deluge NZB Hydra Jackett NZBGet HeadPhones
